sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const Detay = () => { let { id } = useParams(); const [takim, SetTakımlar] = useState([]) const api_link = `https://cryptic-gorge-72989.herokuapp.com/teams/${id}` axios.get(api_link) .then(response => { SetTakımlar(response.data) }, [id]) return (

Takım: {takim.name}

{takim.city}

{takim.stadium}

# First Last Handle
1 Takım Şehir @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
) } export default Detay
